title: Fast moment estimation in data streams in optimal space.
abstract: We give a space-optimal streaming algorithm with update time O(log 2 (1/e)loglog(1/e)) for approximating the pth frequency moment, 0  2 ). When combined with the work of [Harvey-Nelson-Onak, FOCS 2008], we also obtain the first algorithm for entropy estimation in turnstile streams which simultaneously achieves near-optimal space and fast update time.
